ribbondesc: Advancing the frontiers of computational multiphysics through innovative research and cutting-edge numerical methods.

Assistant Research Scientist.title: Development of Second
Assistant Research Scientist.subtitle: Development of Second Generation of Reactive Hydrocode SCIMITAR3Dv2.0
Assistant Research Scientist.overview: SCIMITAR3D is a sharp interface Cartesian grid-based reactive multiphase, multi-material hydrocode that is in development for past 20 years, to solve high speed impact, collision, penetration, and fragmentation problems. I am one of the key developers of second-generation version of SCIMITAR3D contributing to significant new capabilities to the in-house solver in terms of higher order methods for modeling energetic materials, multiple Level set tracking framework, coupled Level set & Volume of Fluid framework, improving the local mesh refinement, python readable energetic materials database.

Assistant Research Scientist.title: Computational Fluid Dynamics
Assistant Research Scientist.subtitle: Advanced methods for fluid flow simulation
Assistant Research Scientist.overview: CFD research focuses on developing next-gen algorithms for turbulence, multiphase, and reactive flows.

about.title: Computational Multiphysics Research Lab
about.description: Advancing the frontiers of computational science through innovative multiphysics simulations and numerical methods. We develop cutting-edge algorithms for complex engineering and scientific applications.
